description: Erection of a hipped roof, rear roof extension with two front windows, rear infill extension and part first floor side extension to No.13 and creation of new pitched roofs over existing first floor side extensions to both properties.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 0, shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 1 REV G, shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 2, shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 3 REV G, shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 4, shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 4A REV G, shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 5, shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 5A, shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 6 REV G, shakespeareway-13 - 15/ 6A REV G, shakespeareway-13 - 15 / 8 REV G and Unnumbered Site Location Plan, received on 15/01/2021) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the buildings without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The roof extensions to 13-15 Shakespeare Way, Feltham, TW13 7PE hereby approved shall be completed as one building operation.

Condition : 6 - The extensions and accommodation hereby approved shall be used solely as part of the properties known as 13 and 15 Shakespeare Way and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes and the premises shall not be used as a house in multiple occupation, including any use within Class C4 of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) or such other legislation as may subsequently supersede it.
Condition : 7 - No part of the development (including any guttering) shall overhang land outside of the ownership of the owner(s) of the application properties.
